content:
I'm glad I could help you explore options for tracking your respiratory health alongside your blood pressure readings! Since you're looking for an app that can integrate with your Omron blood pressure monitor, I'd recommend reaching out to the app developers to confirm compatibility before committing to a particular app.

Additionally, you might want to consider speaking with your healthcare provider about your respiratory health and how it relates to your blood pressure. They may have specific recommendations for tracking and managing your respiratory health, and can provide valuable insights into how it impacts your overall well-being.

In the meantime, I'd be happy to help you explore other health-related topics or answer any questions you may have about tracking your blood pressure and respiratory health. Just let me know what's on your mind!
